briefdescription.para: Do not transfer damage to attachments.

The owner performing the snap callback.
The position of the owner in world space.
The direction of the owner in world space.

memberdef.name: OnDebug

briefdescription.para: Debug callback for rendering on the screen.
Called for first layer contacts to determine if this object should be snapped around or default rv raycast placement is fine.

simplesect.para: True if bounding snap is to be used

briefdescription.para: Initial query around the owner position to see if an object should be processed in contact testing.

simplesect.para: True if the object should be counted

briefdescription.para: Ray cast line test from owner to a tested position.
